name: Kenny and Emily
description:
A compelling story about repairing a broken soul. Kenny and Emily is a 2D platformer game about mental health, cooperation, adventure, redemption, and much more! This game also utilizes Unity's machine learning agents to deliver an exciting and unique collaborative experience with a character controlled by a neural network.

Created for the 2020 global game jam.

Controls:
Arrow keys to move
Z to climb
X + arrow keys to dash. Hold two arrow keys to dash diagonally.
C to jump and progress dialogue
